DOC.brief_summary: Three different supplement use study ( fruit vegetable powder , whey protein calcium ) patient hypertension . The null hypothesis supplement effect participant ' blood pressure .
DOC.detailed_description: Hypertensive participant randomly assign three group . The first group participant take fruit vegetable powder mixed water . The second group take whey protein third group take calcium pill . Blood pressure heart rate variability measure every two week three month .
DOC.criteria: Age 2070 Hypertensive male female subject . Severe cardiovascular renal condition . Pregnancies take medication .
